ghost

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Cell
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Space, Wall

    public abstract class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    Cell is an abstract class that provides a blueprint for each cell of the map. This class stores a cellType enum instance, and is implemented by Space and Wall

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell(int num, int x, int y)

      Clears a cell (used once a piece of fruit has been collected).

        public cellType getCellType(int n)
        A method that takes the number assigned to the cell (from the map), and returns the type of cell, from the cellType enum.
        Parameters:
        n - the number read from the map file that corresponds to a certian type of cell

        cellType

      • empty

        public void empty()
        Clears a cell (used once a piece of fruit has been collected).

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the cell onto the screen. If the sprite is null, then the cell is meant to be empty, and can be skipped.
        Parameters:
        app - the app on which the cell is being drawn

      • drawAll

        public static void drawAll(App app,
                           java.util.List<java.util.List<Cell>> cellMap)
        A static method to call the draw method for all cells in a two dimesional list of cells
        Parameters:
        app - the app on which the cell is being drawn
        cellMap - the List of List of Cells that draw needs to be called through
